ontologyTableRow.name: names
ontologyTableRow.documentation: The full name(s) of the data variable(s) in a comma-seperated list (e.g 'Behavioral Measurement,Gastric Mill Neuron').

ontologyTableRow.name: variableNames
ontologyTableRow.documentation: The shortened name(s) of the data variable(s) in a comma-seperated list (e.g 'behaviorMeasure,GM_neuron'). Must be valid MATLAB variable names.

ontologyTableRow.name: ontologyNodes
ontologyTableRow.documentation: The ontology node id(s) of the data variable (s) in a comma-seperated list of ontology:nodeID (e.g 'EMPTY:00000090,UBERON:3373').

ontologyTableRow.name: data
ontologyTableRow.documentation: A structure with variableNames as fields and corresponding data as values (e.g. data = struct('behaviorMeasure',1,'GM_neuron',1)).
